import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown' import {nanoid} from 'nanoid' import i18n from 'i18next' export const temperatureDropdownList =(changeTemperatureUnitsState) => { return (
{i18n.t("common.temperatureDropdown.title")} {Promise.resolve().then(() => {changeTemperatureUnitsState('kelvin', 'K')})} }>Kelvin {Promise.resolve().then(() => {changeTemperatureUnitsState('celsius', '째C')})}}>Celsius {Promise.resolve().then(() => {changeTemperatureUnitsState('fahrenheit', '째F')})}}>Fahrenheit
) }
